deity: Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones
deity_markdown: [Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones](/Deities.aspx?ID=172)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones (She Who Listens)](/Deities.aspx?ID=172)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Sarkorian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=15)

**Edicts** Provide shelter and succor for women and children in need, act as a responsible steward of your environment

**Anathema** Harm a pregnant mother or innocent child, including animals

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, LE, NG, N, NE, CG, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

**Favored Weapon** [Ranseur](/Weapons.aspx?ID=35)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=24)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=10)
(bull only, appears as stag)

- **6th**
[Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123)

</column>
name: Stag Mother of the Forest of Stones (She Who Listens)
